SELECT c_gateway.gateway_code, c_gateway_attr1.`name`, c_gateway_attr1.location, c_gateway_attr1.`comment`, c_gateway_upload_status.voltage, b_status.`name` STATUS, c_gateway_attr1.tdate FROM c_gateway LEFT JOIN c_gateway_attr1 ON c_gateway.id = c_gateway_attr1.c_gateway_id LEFT JOIN c_gateway_upload_status ON c_gateway.id = c_gateway_upload_status.c_gateway_id LEFT JOIN b_status ON c_gateway_attr1.staus = b_status.`value` AND b_status.b_status_main_id = 3 WHERE 1=1 AND c_gateway_attr1.sys_user_id = #{pd.sys_user_id}
and ( c_gateway_attr1.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.name}),'%') )
and ( c_gateway.gateway_code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.gateway_code}),'%') )
and ( c_gateway_attr1.location LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.location}),'%') )
and ( c_gateway_attr1.staus = #{pd.status} )
GROUP BY c_gateway.id
